Verses: 1 appozhudhu Elisaa: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Naalai Inneraththil Samaariyaavin Vaasalile Oru Marakkaal Kodhumai Maa Oru Sekkalukkum, Irandu Marakkaal Vaarkodhumai Oru Sekkalukkum Virkappadum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.

2 appozhudhu Raajaavukkuk Kailaagu Kodukkira Pradhaani Oruvan Dhevanudaiya Manushanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Idho, Karththar Vaanaththile Madhagugalai Undaakkinaalum Ippadi Nadakkumaa Endraan. Adharku Avan: Unnudaiya Kangalinaale Adhaik Kaanbaai; Aanaalum Adhile Saappidamaattaai Endraan.
3 kushtarogigalaana Naaluper Olimugavaasalil Irundhaargal; Avargal Oruvarai Oruvar Nokki: Naam Inge Irundhu Saagavendiyadhu Enna?

4 pattanaththirkul Povomendraalum Pattanaththil Panjam Undaayirukkiradhinaal Ange Saavom; Naam Inge Irundhaalum Saavom; Aagaiyaal Ippozhudhu Seeriyarudaiya Raanuvaththirkup Povom Vaarungal; Avargal Nammai Uyirode Vaiththaal Pizhaikkirom; Nammaik Kondraal Saagirom Endru Solli,
5 seeriyarudaiya Raanuvaththirkup Poga Iruttode Ezhundhirundhu, Seeriyarudaiya Paalayaththin Munnaniyil Vandhaargal; Ange Oruvarumillai.

6 aandavar Seeriyarin Raanuvaththirku Radhangalin Iraichchalaiyum, Kudhiraigalin Iraichchalaiyum, Magaa Raanuvaththin Iraichchalaiyum Ketkap Panninadhinaal, Avargal Oruvarai Oruvar Nokki: Idho, Nammidaththil Porukku Vara, Isravelin Raajaa Eththiyarin Raajaakkalaiyum Egipthiyarin Raajaakkalaiyum Namakku Virodhamaagak Kooli Poruththinaan Endru Solli,

7 iruttode Ezhundhirundhu Odippoi, Thangal Koodaarangalaiyum Thangal Kudhiraigalaiyum Thangal Kazhudhaigalaiyum Thangal Paalayaththaiyum Avaigal Irundha Pragaaramaaga Vittu, Thangal Praananmaaththiram Thappumpadi Odipponaargal.

8 andhak Kushtarogigal Paalayaththin Munnanimattum Vandhapodhu, Oru Koodaaraththirkul Pravesiththu Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Adhilirundhu Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Vasthirangalaiyum Eduththuk Kondu Poi Oliththuvaiththu, Thirumbivandhu, Veroru Koodaaraththirkul Pravesiththu, Adhilirundhum Appadiye Eduththukkondu Poi Oliththu Vaiththu,

9 pinbu Avargal Oruvarai Oruvar Nokki: Naam Seygiradhu Nyaayamalla, Innaal Narcheydhi Arivikkum Naal; Naam Mavunamaayirundhu, Pozhudhu Vidiyumattum Kaaththirundhaal Kutram Nammel Sumarum; Ippodhum Naam Poi Raajaavin Aramanaiyaarukku Idhai Arivippom Vaarungal Endraargal.

10 appadiye Avargal Vandhu, Pattanaththu Vaasal Kaavalaalanai Nokkik Kooppittu: Naangal Seeriyarin Paalayaththirkup Poivandhom; Ange Oruvarum Illai, Oru Manushanudaiya Saththamum Illai, Kattiyirukkira Kudhiraigalum Kattiyirukkira Kazhudhaigalum, Koodaarangalum Irundhapragaaram Irukkiradhu Endru Avargalukku Sonnaargal.
11 appozhudhu Avan Vaasalkaakkira Matravargalaik Kooppittaan; Avargal Ulle Poi Raajaavin Aramanaiyaarukku Adhai Ariviththaargal.

12 appozhudhu Raajaa Raaththiriyil Ezhundhu, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Seeriyar Namakku Seygira Kaariyaththai Ungalukkuth Theriyappaduththugiren; Naam Pattiniyaayirukkirom; Endru Avargal Arivaargal; Aagaiyaal Naam Pattanaththilirundhu Purappattupponaal Nammai Uyirode Pidiththukkondu Pattanaththirkul Pravesikkalaam Endru Enni, Avargal Paalayaththai Vittup Purappattu Veliyil Oliththuk Kondirukkiraargal Endraan.

13 avan Oozhiyakkaararil Oruvan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Inge Meedhiyaana Kudhiraigalil Aindhu Kudhiraigalaik Kondupoga Uththaravu Kodum; Idho, Inge Meedhiyaana Isravelin Sagala Eraalaththilum, Maandupona Isravelin Sagala Koottaththilum, Avaigal; Maaththiram Meendhirukkiradhu; Avaigalai Naam Anuppippaarppom Endraan.
14 appadiye Irandu Radhak Kudhiraigalaik Konduvandhaargal; Raajaa Poi Vaarungal Endru Solli, Seeriyarin Raanuvaththaith Thodarndhu Pogumpadi Anuppinaan.

15 avargal Yordhaan Mattum Avargalaip Pin Thodarndhuponaargal; Seeriyar Theeviriththu Odugaiyil, Avargal Erindhu Potta Vasthirangalaalum Thattu Muttugalaalum Vazhiyellaam Niraindhirundhadhu; Anuppappattavargal Thirumbivandhu Raajaavukku Adhai Ariviththaargal.

16 appozhudhu Janangal Purappattu, Seeriyarin Paalayaththaik Kollaiyittaargal; Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Oru Marakkaal Kodhumai Maa Oru Sekkalukkum, Irandu Marakkaal Vaarkodhumai Oru Sekkalukkum Virkappattadhu.

17 raajaa Thanakkuk Kailaagukodukkira Andhap Pradhaaniyai Olimugavaasalil Visaarippaayirukkak Kattalaiyittirundhaan; Olimugavaasalile Janangal Avanai Nerungi Midhiththadhinaale, Raajaa Dhevanudaiya Manushanidaththil Vandhapodhu Solliyirundhapadiye, Avanseththupponaan.

18 irandu Marakkaal Vaarkodhumai Oru Sekkalukkum, Oru Marakkaal Kodhumai Maa Oru Sekkalukkum, Naalai Inneraththile Samaariyaavin Olimugavaasalil Virkum Endru Dhevanudaiya Manushan Raajaavode Sonnadhinpadiye Nadandhadhu.

19 adharku Andhap Pradhaani Dhevanudaiya Manushanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Idho, Karththar Vaanaththile Madhagugalai Undaakkinaalum, Indha Vaarththaiyin Padi Nadakkumaa Endru Solla; Ivan, Idho, Unnudaiya Kangalinaale Adhaik Kaanbaai, Aanaalum Adhile Saappidamaattaai Endraane.
20 andhap Pragaaramaagaththaane Avanukku Nadandhadhu; Olimugavaasalile Janangal Avanai Nerungi Midhiththadhinaale Avan Seththup Ponaan.
